description: Mobile techniques used by Android/SpyAgent, ATT&CK software S1214 (v1.0)
name: Android/SpyAgent (S1214)

techniques.comment: [Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214) can execute an automated phone call.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)
[Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214) has attempted to detect anti-spam call applications.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)

[Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214) has used the official icon of the Korean police application and  the package name “kpo,” which contain references related to the Korean police.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)
[Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214) has used the Tencent packer to hide its malicious payload.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)
[Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214) has exfiltrated SMS and MMS messages.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)
[Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214) has collected device network information, such as the IMEI and the phone number.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)
[Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214)’s payload has obtained the C2 address via Twitter accounts.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)
[Android/SpyAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1214) has used the Tencent Push Notification Service to receive commands from the C2 server.(Citation: McAfee MoqHao 2019)
